extensionDescription.message: Save and switch between different account cookies and LocalStorage for websites

domainTip.message: This input is read-only and automatically gets the domain of the current tab

accountNamePlaceholder.message: Please enter account name (e.g., Account 1, Work Account)

accountNameTip.message: Used to identify different account data (Cookie + LocalStorage)

saveButton.message: Save Current Cookie and LocalStorage to this Account

switchButton.message: Switch to Selected Account's Cookie and LocalStorage

invalidDomainError.message: Unable to get valid domain from current page, cannot save Cookie and LocalStorage!

noDataToSave.message: No Cookie and LocalStorage data available to save on current website!

saveSuccess.message: Successfully saved Cookie and LocalStorage data for "$ACCOUNT_NAME$"!

saveError.message: Failed to save Cookie and LocalStorage, please check console log!

switchInvalidDomain.message: Unable to get valid domain from current page, cannot switch Cookie and LocalStorage!

selectAccount.message: Please select an account to switch!

accountDataNotFound.message: Cookie and LocalStorage data for "$ACCOUNT_NAME$" not found!

switchSuccess.message: Successfully switched to Cookie and LocalStorage for "$ACCOUNT_NAME$", page has been refreshed!

switchError.message: Failed to switch Cookie and LocalStorage, please check console log!

deleteInvalidDomain.message: Unable to get valid domain from current page, cannot delete account data!

deleteSelectAccount.message: Please select an account to delete!

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete Cookie and LocalStorage data for "$ACCOUNT_NAME$"? This action cannot be undone!

deleteSuccess.message: Successfully deleted Cookie and LocalStorage data for "$ACCOUNT_NAME$"!

deleteError.message: Failed to delete account data, please check console log!

domainFetchFailure.message: Unable to get domain (not a web page)
